CustomField.description: What: This field is to ensure that icons show up properly in Communities.
CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS($Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290,".force.com"), MID( $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, FIND("/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, FIND(".force.com/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, 0)), FIND("/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, FIND("/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, FIND(".force.com/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, 0))+1) - FIND("/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, FIND(".force.com/", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_290, 0)) ) , "")
CustomField.label: URLsrc
